text: Rail bus Bathara Kresna is a railbus service owned by PT Kereta Api Indonesia that operates on the Surakarta Purwosari-Wonogiri route and is a cooperation project between the Surakarta City Government and PT KAI, when Surakarta City was led by Joko Widodo. == References == == External links == * Official website of Indonesian Railways Category:Passenger rail transport in Indonesia Category:Infrastructure in Indonesia
title: Bathara Kresna Rail Bus
